topics.title: Predicting Answers from Context
topics.description: Learn to anticipate answers by analyzing question context and speaker cues

templates.name: Basic Strategy
templates.content:
1. Read questions before listening
2. Underline keywords in questions
3. Think about possible answers
4. Listen for synonyms and paraphrasing

templates.name: Advanced Technique
templates.content:
1. Analyze question types for likely answers
2. Consider context clues and speaker roles
3. Use background knowledge of topics
4. Practice active prediction during pauses

data.description: Break down questions for key information
Identify important words to listen for
Recognize what kind of answer is needed

tips: Look for signal words in questions
Use your knowledge of the topic
